001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.SimpleHolder;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
016import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
017import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
018import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
019import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.GradientDescentOptimizer;
020import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
021import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps.*;
022import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
023import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.EpochRegime;
024import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
025import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
026import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
027
028import java.util.*;
029
030public class NewOptimizers {
031
032    public static boolean SHOW_FIT = false;
033
034    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
035    public static <N extends Number> void main(String[] args) {
036        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = (JavaNumberTypeSupport<N>) JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE;
037        N learningRate = typeSupport.valueOf(0.1f);
038        int epochs = 100_000;
039        int m = 9; // model complexity
040
041        Plot weightPlot = new Plot("Absolute sum of weights");
042        weightPlot.display();
043
044        Plot stepSizePlot = new Plot("Step size");
045        stepSizePlot.setYRange(0.0f, 1.0f);
046        stepSizePlot.display();
047
048        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("Train RME");
049        mrePlot.setYRange(0.0f, 1.0f);
050        mrePlot.display();
051
052        VanillaGradientDescent<N> vanilla = new VanillaGradientDescent<>(learningRate);
053        AdaGrad<N> adagrad = new AdaGrad<>(learningRate);
054        RMSProp<N> rmsProp = new RMSProp<>(learningRate, typeSupport.valueOf(0.9));
055        Adam<N> adam = new Adam<>(learningRate, typeSupport.valueOf(0.9), typeSupport.valueOf(0.999));
056        AdamW<N> adamW = new AdamW<>(learningRate, typeSupport.valueOf(0.9), typeSupport.valueOf(0.999), typeSupport.valueOf(0.001));
057        ARGOptimizer<N> arg = new ARGOptimizer<>(learningRate);
058
059        Map<String, UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>> optimizers = new LinkedHashMap<>() {
060            {
061                put("Vanilla", vanilla);
062//                put("AdaGrad", adagrad);
063//                put("RMSProp", rmsProp);
064                put("Adam", adam);
065                put("AdamW", adamW);
066                put("ARG", arg);
067            }
068        };
069        for (Map.Entry<String, UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>> optimizerEntry : optimizers.entrySet()) {
070            showForNumberType(typeSupport, optimizerEntry.getKey(), createOptimizer(optimizerEntry.getValue()), Set.of(), epochs, m, weightPlot, mrePlot, stepSizePlot);
071        }
072    }
073
074    private static <N extends Number> Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> createOptimizer(UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N> updateStep) {
075        LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer<N> decomposer = new LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer<>();
076        return new GradientDescentOptimizer<>(decomposer, updateStep);
077    }
078
079    private static <N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, String title, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations, int epochs, int m, Plot weightPlot, Plot mrePlot, Plot stepSizePlot) {
080        if (SHOW_FIT) {
081            System.out.println("Showing fit for optimizer: " + title);
082        }
083        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Fit " + title);
084        fitPlot.setYRange(-2, 2);
085
086        SimpleHolder<LinearRegression<N>> regressionHolder = SimpleHolder.create();
087        Map<Optimizer<?, ?>, Vector<N>> previousParameters = new HashMap<>();
088        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(epochs, EpochRegime.sample(1000, new EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener() {
089            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
090            @Override
091            public <M extends Number> void epochCompleted(EpochRegime epochRegime, int currentEpoch, TrainableFunction<M> model, DataSet<M> trainingSet, Optimizer<? extends TrainableFunction<M>, M> optimizer) {
092                LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> linearBasisFunctionModel = (LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>) model;
093                Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regressionHolder.get().calculateRMEs(linearBasisFunctionModel);
094                mrePlot.addToSeries(title, new float[]{currentEpoch}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
095                mrePlot.redraw();
096                weightPlot.addToSeries(title, new float[]{currentEpoch}, new float[]{(float) (Arrays.stream(model.getParameters()).mapToDouble(p -> model.getCurrentNumberType().absolute(p).doubleValue()).sum())});
097                weightPlot.redraw();
098                if (SHOW_FIT) {
099                    fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(linearBasisFunctionModel, "Fit");
100                }
101                fitPlot.redraw();
102                Vector<N> oldParameters = previousParameters.get(optimizer);
103                Vector<N> newParameters = Vectors.of(linearBasisFunctionModel.getCurrentNumberType(), linearBasisFunctionModel.getParameters()).transpose();
104                if (oldParameters != null) {
105                    N magnitude = newParameters.subtract(oldParameters).norm();
106                    stepSizePlot.addToSeries(title, new float[]{currentEpoch}, new float[]{magnitude.floatValue()});
107                    stepSizePlot.redraw();
108                }
109                previousParameters.put(optimizer, newParameters);
110                if (currentEpoch == epochs) {
111                    System.out.println(title + ": " + Arrays.toString(model.getParameters()));
112                }
113            }
114        })).batch();
115        LinearRegression<N> regression = createIterativeTrainedRegression(typeSupport, optimizer, regime);
116        regressionHolder.set(regression);
117
118        if (SHOW_FIT) {
119            fitPlot.plotDataSet(regression.getTrainSet(), "Train Set");
120            fitPlot.display();
121        }
122
123        regression.fitComplexity(m);
124    }
125
126    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createIterativeTrainedRegression(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer, Regime regime) {
127        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
128        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
129        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator, optimizer, regime);
130    }
131
132    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer, Regime regime) {
133        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
134        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
135        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
136        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
137        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
138        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
139        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, optimizer, regime);
140    }
141
142}
